subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: With two teams rich in height and bulk facing off, 5-foot-10-inch Brandon Taylor made four 3-pointers for Utah in a game in which all the leads, until the last one, were elastic.
snippet: With two teams rich in height and bulk facing off, 5-foot-10-inch Brandon Taylor made four 3-pointers for Utah in a game in which all the leads, until the last one, were elastic.
